name: Jump Penguin - Smashy Shooty Road to Sky, Unbeatable Whale Jumping Game
name_original: Jump Penguin - Smashy Shooty Road to Sky, Unbeatable Whale Jumping Game
description:
Get ready to start a journey with a super cute penguin!

All you need to do is control the clumsy penguin to avoid snowballs and reach the sky.

Let it flap! Let it jump!
Easy to play & full of fun!

Start now and make your record!
